content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I like to bake cupcakes and watch wrestling.  How about you?
I love to play music, and I'm always looking for new ways to express myself.
That's cool!  I hope to learn how to play an instrument someday.
It's a lot of fun!  Have you ever been to a music festival?
I have not!  I would love to go to one someday.  What's your favorite kind of music?
I like a lot of different types of music, but my favorite is probably rock.
Me too!  I love rock music.  What are some of your favorite bands?
I love The Beatles, Led Zeppelin, and Pink Floyd.  How about you?
I love The Beatles and Led Zeppelin too!  My favorite band is probably The Rolling Stones.
The Rolling Stones are great!  I love their music.  Do you like to go to concerts?
I love going to concerts!  I have been to a few concerts in the past, and I always have a great time.
That's awesome!  I have been to a few concerts as well, and I always have a great time too.  I love the energy of a live concert.
Me too!  I love being in a crowd of people who are all there to enjoy the same music.
That's what it's all about!  I love being able to connect with other people through music.
Me too!  Music is such a powerful thing.  It can bring people together in a way that nothing else can
